jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for building user-facing features and ensuring the best user experience. You will work with modern technologies and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in frontend development
Strong knowledge of React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript
Experience with state management libraries (Redux, Zustand)
Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines and deployment processes
Strong problem-solving and communication skills
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Modern office environment with latest equipment

jobs.title: Product Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Join our marketing team as a Product Marketing Manager. You will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies for our product portfolio. You will work closely with product teams to create compelling marketing campaigns and drive product adoption.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in product marketing
Strong analytical and communication skills
Experience with marketing automation tools
Knowledge of digital marketing channels
Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
Experience with market research and competitive analysis

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description: We are seeking a creative UX/UI Designer to join our design team. You will be responsible for creating intuitive and engaging user experiences. You will work on various projects including web applications, mobile apps, and digital products.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in UX/UI design
Proficiency in design tools (Figma, Adobe Creative Suite)
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles
Experience with prototyping and user testing
Portfolio demonstrating design skills and creativity
Knowledge of design systems and accessibility standards

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Join our analytics team as a Data Analyst. You will be responsible for analyzing data to provide insights and support business decisions. You will work with various data sources and create reports and visualizations to help stakeholders understand business performance.
requirements: 1+ years of experience in data analysis
Proficiency in SQL and data visualization tools
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience with statistical analysis and reporting
Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
Knowledge of Python or R for data analysis

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join our engineering team. You will be responsible for building scalable server-side applications. You will work with modern technologies and contribute to the architecture and design of our backend systems.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in backend development
Strong knowledge of Node.js, Python, or Java
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
Experience with microservices architecture
Strong understanding of RESTful APIs and GraphQL

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Join our DevOps team to help build and maintain our infrastructure. You will be responsible for automating deployment processes, managing cloud infrastructure, and ensuring system reliability and performance.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in DevOps or infrastructure
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines
Strong scripting skills (Bash, Python)
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
